articles.description: A new study, using data captured by the W. M. Keck Observatory on Maunakea, Hawaii during a close approach in 2018 revealed more about the make up of the iceball.
articles.content:
A bright green comet that came within 7.1 million miles of the Earth when it came into the inner solar system in 2018 contained 'abnormally high' levels of alcohol, study found.

articles.title: Europe tests parachutes responsible for slowing down its rover entering Mars at 21,000 kmph - India Today
articles.description: The parachute will be responsible for slowing down the spacecraft after it successfully passes through the Martian atmosphere before landing on the surface.

articles.title: Lunar Exploration as a Service: From landers to spacesuits, NASA is renting rather than owning - SpaceNews
articles.description: NASA’s Human Landing System program is the biggest bet the agency has made on the commercial space industry since the commercial crew program a decade ago.
